ygData.subject: Re: Oblivion Is At Hand
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC( I didn t know they were outside the ship even?) ... She smiled, I like the idea. He shall be the first. ... Then, he suddenly saw Hot Rod and K-9

OOC( I didn't know they were outside the ship even?)

::Feline::

She smiled, "I like the idea. He shall be the first."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>       Skulletron viewed Foxfingers looking through one camera.  
Then, he suddenly saw Hot Rod and K-9 outside the CF through the 
exterior.  Hmmm..Foxfingers could wait, he served no use.  Hot Rod 
was down.  Yessss.  Excellent.
> 
>      "Feline, I think this is our chance to cause some real 
chaos!!!  The Maximal named Hot Rod is down.  We can reprogram him, 
and tell him that his main goal is to exterminate the one named K-9 
and friends.  We might even be able to spread gossip that K-9 killed 
Hot Rod intentionally!!  Then we'll cause chaos!!!!  So, what do you 
think, beautiful?"
